sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import "./Weather.css"; export default function Weather() { let weatherData = { city: "Kyiv", date: "13/03/2023", description: "Cloudy", tempNow: 21, feelsLike: 25, humidity: 60, wind: 13, pictureDescription: "Cloudy", }; return (

{weatherData.city}

{weatherData.date}


{weatherData.description}


  • {weatherData.tempNow} °C | °F
  • Feels like: {weatherData.feelsLike} °C
  • Humidity: {weatherData.humidity} %
  • Wind: {weatherData.wind} km/h
); }
